name: Madimetja
description: I am an Electrical Engineer, who loves to build things in real life, internet and everything in betwen. My interests lie between Software Engineering and Data science.

projects.name: Rock Paper Scissors Game
projects.description: The focus of this project was on working with the React frame-work and Javascript. The design of this game makes one think of the state management and the data structure of the of the game (the flow of Data).

projects.name: Sudoku Game
projects.description: The focus of this project was on working with the React frame-work and Javascript. The design of this game makes one think of the state management and the data structure of the of the game (the flow of Data). Although one can use an npm package for getting the Sudoku board (solved and unsolved), a library of function were created from scratch to handle all that.

projects.name: Current Weather App
projects.description: Designed and implemented a web application for viewing current weather information. The app makes use of the OpenWeather API for weather data and Goodgle API for location Autocomplete.

projects.name: Honours Project: Actions Speak Louder than Words
projects.description: Designed and implemented a computer program that has the ability to translate South African Sign Language to text, and then speech.

projects.name: BillCleave Web Application
projects.description: A web application for splitting bills in a shared household. Applying good practices for collaborative software development, making use of agile project management techniques.

projects.name: File Transfer Application
projects.description: Designed and implemented a file transfer application system which makes use of the networking principles such as protocols, application and transport layer, socket programming etc. The application has a user‚Äêinterface which allows a user to perform the desired tasks as per the RFC 959 document.

projects.name: Centipede Arcade Game
projects.description: Implemented an arcade game in the fixed shooter genre in an Object Orientated design.
